snippet: Casting aside controversy over the deal, investors of the natural gas pipeline operator approved Kinder Morgan’s $21.1 billion bid.
abstract: Casting aside controversy over the deal, investors of the natural gas pipeline operator approved Kinder Morgan’s $21.1 billion bid.

headline.main: El Paso Shareholders Approve Kinder Morgan Takeover
headline.print_headline: El Paso Shareholders Approve Kinder Morgan Deal
